name: Fire Burst
description:
Made for the 3rd Vimjam - 8 Bits To Infinity, with the restriction of 'Multi-use', and the theme of 'Turn Up The Heat' (Submitted early due to personal life stuff)

You are trapped with a monster, and only have a few torches and candles. Light the candles and then use your Fireburst to kill the monster

Controls:

Move - WASD

Attack - Left Mouse Button (Can only be done with a full fire bar)
